data.name: Trainz Plus DLC - CN GP9 Phase I & II (2 Pack)
data.detailed_description: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I & II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.
data.about_the_game: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I & II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.
data.short_description: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I & II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
